Research

The Cosmic Dawn

I study the birth of the universe from when it was 1% of its current age.

The Owens Valley Long Wavelength Array

I built and commissioned a new low-frequency radio telescope (30 to 80 MHz) located near Big Pine, California.

Software

  • MLPFlagger
  • A flagging routine developed for the OVRO LWA.
  • TTCal
  • A calibration routine developed for the OVRO LWA.
  • BPJSpec
  • A 21 cm power spectrum code developed for the OVRO LWA.
  • CasaCore.jl
  • A Julia language wrapper of the casacore library.
  • LibHealpix.jl
  • A Julia language wrapper of the healpix library.
